titleStmt.title: A prohibition for allome.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie.,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Greenwich the nineteenth day of June, in the seuenth yeere of our raigne ...
Announcing the royal monopoly for the manufacture and sale of alum. Cf. STC.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
